website_summaries.verdict: The new 13in MacBook Pro is a portable powerhouse, but it's expensive and beginning to lag behind the Windows competition in design and battery life.

customer_reviews.title: Overheating like hell...
customer_reviews.text: Its a good laptop if its about speed,image etc., dont get me wrong,but for that kind of price i didnt expect to almost have my balls cooked after just browsing internet! Seriously... It was just fresh set up, Safari opened, no chrome (we know why) and then magic beigns... getting warmer and warmer and finally hot... At the same time i have MBP from early 2015 and its or cold completly or slightly warm. Returned unfortunately, i dont want to participate in global warming if i dare to run Lightroom...
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Faulty after a few days use
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple of days this laptop is already faulty. I first noticed the issue when every time I logged back in, a messages popped up to say the computer had to restart due to an error. This happened about 3x. Then I noticed that the user icon at the login page had shifted to the bottom left and had some fuzzy colours at the top. Then I noticed that the magic keyboard was no longer illuminated but still worked when I touched it and then that too began having these fuzzy lines as if the ink had ran out or something. What a shame for Apple. I’m returning for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Initial review: It's exceptional for multitasking. Fan does get loud occasionally when under load. Speakers that made me sell my old bluetooth speaker. Super fast Thunderbolt ports.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Correct model, works a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Finally the MBP has a good keyboard again! Perfect little 13" powerhouse. Quick shipping and I did indeed receive the 2020 model as described, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Turtlemania

customer_reviews.title: great MacBook and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery and item arrived as expect and NOT the wrong MacBook and stated in reviews.
customer_reviews.author: matthew clark

customer_reviews.title: the laptop heats up a lot
customer_reviews.text: I've received the correct model 2020 which I ordered. Macbook Pro 2020 magic keyboard heats up pretty fast. Just played a game of chess for like 5 minutes and its burning like he'll. Should have trusted the reviews of the people who were saying its heating up. I'm going to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Adeen M.

customer_reviews.title: Catalina OS can be a show stopper!
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware! This MacBook comes with Catalina OS installed: you will not be able to use any 32 bits software!! It's not even possible to downgrade the OS to any previous version due to hardware limitation. This is the reason why I'm sadly returning it. Other thing I didn't like: Webcam quality is low (common to most laptops unfortunately)
customer_reviews.author: Alo

customer_reviews.title: Processor is very slow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and used it for a few weeks and then returned it back as the process of power is very low compared to similar models from previous years. I believe the processor is 1.6 GHz and that might not be enough if you were expecting to do some video editing or some other process of heavy work. I noticed that even surfing the Internet and trying to stream videos online did become a little bit slow. I would recommend paying a little bit extra and getting the model higher.
customer_reviews.author: Quamer Khaliq

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing like a macbook
customer_reviews.text: My wife decided to replace her 2017 macbook air with this macbook pro 13 inch, 2020. I have a 2019 macbook pro 15 inch and all I can say there is nothing like a macbook. No more blue screen of death, windows we hate you, no more hardware conflicts, no need for antivirus and Apple makes sure that everything is running smoothly. Nothing like a macbook.
customer_reviews.author: john nikolakis

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop you can buy in this price range.
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonable price for a MacBook Pro. Looks really nice in Space Grey. Touch Bar is handy and no issues with keyboard. Video quality is superb. 13 inch is fine, not too big, not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer97

customer_reviews.title: New MacBook Pro!
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit wary about buying this having read some of the reviews, with some people not receiving the right product. When mine arrived, I checked it instantly. It was packaged well, arrived in perfect condition (New, as expected). It appears to have all the right keyboard features I was expecting with this purchase. The specs all seem to be fine too. The MacBook did come with a power adapter. As always with Apple products, the price is a bit high, but.. you get what you pay for. If you’re thinking about buying this, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with the laptop. Very light. The display is amazing and the whole laptop is very snappy. Didn’t get hot and the fans didn’t activated and if they did, I didn’t notice. Great laptop. Great to use sidecar if you’ve got an iPad. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Goncalves

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with my purchase of this MacBook. Only recently after having it for 12 days I have found out that when I was pressing certain keys that there are bumpy holes that I have no clue how it happened as I have not stabbed my MacBook with anything. I do not know what has caused this but it is annoying knowing this. So please be careful and check your MacBook when first opening.
customer_reviews.author: Yrick

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny- smart buy
customer_reviews.text: Can’t express much but albeit apple products are overpriced they are worth the possession. The durability is outstanding, performance is incredible (renders high quality videos/ movies in matter of minutes), sleek design and what not. Got this for my wife who loves to operate it as the UI is fluid and simple
customer_reviews.author: Krishna Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the expectations
customer_reviews.text: The product that arrived was exactly what was advertised. Really quick delivery, really good packaging. In terms of performance, I have to admit that the speed and accuracy is out of this world. The keyboard is just absolutely fantastic. I find the Touch Bar as a bit unneeded, but once you get used to it you really can't go back to a laptop that doesn't have it. Totally recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitrios

customer_reviews.title: First class product...
customer_reviews.text: The PC was delivered quickly and has, so far, lived up to expectations. Easy to set up and use and the processor is very quick. Wonderful screen.
customer_reviews.author: Mintcake

customer_reviews.title: Very quick
customer_reviews.text: This is the first mac I’ve had and find it easy to use very good quality I love it not cheap but much better quality than a normal laptop thanks
customer_reviews.author: gws

customer_reviews.title: Stunning, first class.
customer_reviews.text: I must admit to being an Apple fan but this thing exceeds my expectations. Don't worry if you have been used to PC's in the past, you will soon get used to the Apple operation system.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Pro 13 inch
customer_reviews.text: very good as you'd expect best feature is the much longer battery life from my 2012 MacBook Air
customer_reviews.author: Simón Coull

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop, nice upgrade from our old Mac. Even better that we got it on a promotion, so it was was cheaper than the Apple Store. Looking forward to using it for University.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Bruney

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great product and the latest model with improved keyboard is absolutely great. The laptop does get very hot with just 30 mins usage but initial days.
customer_reviews.author: Perview

customer_reviews.title: Perfect laptop for light and simple computing
customer_reviews.text: Just can’t go wrong, always top quality. Love it. Python programming, Linux sys admin work and DevOps. This laptop is perfect for light on the go working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Cannot fault, it’s amazing! I use it daily and it never has any trouble doing any task I throw at it
customer_reviews.author: Alfie

customer_reviews.title: Flaw on keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The MacBook was found to have a flaw on the keyboard. It was a minor flaw but caused a bit of disappointment on the perception that Apple & Amazon delivered products without flaw
customer_reviews.author: poyc

customer_reviews.title: Overheat
customer_reviews.text: Built quality is good but had issues with static shock and overheating just for photo transfer and watching movie so returned back to amazon and they took 2 weeks to refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice product, works very good. The design is flawless. I had before a pro from 2011 so the differences are many. The product is the one from description, 2020 model.
customer_reviews.author: Denisa Neagu

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it yesterday, Got it today! Amazing. Everything as promised , the right box, the right mac, and brand new. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Hubbies Gift House

customer_reviews.title: It's a great combo - portability & performance
customer_reviews.text: I use it for office, coding, social, video. And it performs smoothly with all of them! My last Intel Mac, most probably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant - delivered super quick and cheaper than buying in the Apple store. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jon Roche

customer_reviews.title: Quality build that will last.
customer_reviews.text: Good all round device. As with all Apple products, a bit on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.author: Bill O'Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Very good =)
customer_reviews.text: I loved the service and agility in delivery. My Macbook Pro 2020 it is working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Luciene Sabino Damião

customer_reviews.title: UK 2020 model. 👍
customer_reviews.text: Same model as the Apple store, just a bit cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: stephen bateman

customer_reviews.title: damp smell in box
customer_reviews.text: the product came and the box instantly smelled of damp, like it had gotten wet. No visible signs that it had and i presumed it would have just been the plastic on the outside, but opened the box and the laptop itself and all items in the box also had a damp smell. Don’t believe it’s had an impact on performance, although it was acting strange during set up (very loud fans that continued for about an hour until I turned it off and back on. Probably wouldn’t recommend buying a macbook from amazon as this is the second macbook in my house we’ve bought from here and both have arrived like this.
customer_reviews.author: oriana

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 1 week and left me without a laptop for up to 2 weeks while Amazon decided what to do with it. Bought this to make my life easier and as a result it’s made my life harder at a time of the year when I could have done without. I’m self employed and Amazon have conspired to drive my small business into the ground. Screw you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Will Hitchmough

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced , tiny screen
customer_reviews.text: Very overpriced for what it actually is, a basic mac laptop with a Teeny screen. Do you want to pay £1.2K for a tiny screen ? Well I don’t, so sent it back for a refund. Overpriced tosh - needed to squint to read text, do better
customer_reviews.author: Wig keeper

customer_reviews.title: Still excellent across the board
customer_reviews.text: Needed a brand-new MacBook Pro but didn't want to go with M1 because my friends have been having issues with theirs. This one is perfect for my needs and I won't have any compatibility issues with any of the apps I use. Upgraded from the 2015 MacBook Pro and the difference between that one and this one is incredible. I haven't had the heat or fan issues I see others having with this model. It is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Present so I can not say anything but my grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apple Mac pro
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this Mac Pro 13 inch I’m a real apple convert
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Geraldine Kane

customer_reviews.title: Charger stop working in a few days. Costs for new charger were refounded by Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Today we bougth new charger, as one that came with the Mac is not working any more. Now we are waiting document from official distributer from our country to start waranty claim. Technical supports reaction for my problem was quick an proffesional. There refound done for new charger.
customer_reviews.author: Delta plus

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product came exactly as specified (just pick the right CPU 2.0 or 1.4). So far, it is a great laptop for me as a developer.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Rother

customer_reviews.title: No Virus's
customer_reviews.text: After changing to IOS system from Windows I have never looked back
customer_reviews.author: arthur morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Have had so many issues with my Mac’s from Amazon. Freezing, Slow performance and overheating. Either they sell faulty ones or this model has a defect
customer_reviews.author: Az

customer_reviews.title: I am sure it will be fine when I get usaed to it
customer_reviews.text: My first MacBook. Easy to set up & log on. I found it hard to. See the cursor at times, an external mouse made it a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: John Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Costomer service works just give them time
customer_reviews.text: The computer didn’t turn up however the service team were great and sorting me out a refund. I will be reordering when everything is processed. Thanks for your support
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Really competitive price, product arrived in perfect condition. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Robson Gimenes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best
customer_reviews.text: Bought Dell XPS 13 9300 recently, but it was full of problems! So bought this MacBook then and haven't had any issues! Loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Hussain Abbas Hatim Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good machine but has limitations.
customer_reviews.text: The minimalist approach of Apple is a risk. USB C is not Thunderbolt 3. Thunderbotl 3 docks cost a fortune and many SSDs like Samsung T5 only operate if directly plugged into the machine. And you cannot daisy chain like USB 1 and 2. That is a major step back if you have current kit. For sound buy an external sound unit like M Audio Air Hub to avoid constantly plugging and unplugging headphone jacks. The onboard SSD is too small. One cannot fit other SSDs into the computer and so external SSDs are a must for Logic Pro.
customer_reviews.author: S.w

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The screens on these laptops will stop working after a few years and then cost £600 to fix. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Malcolm

product_meta.title: New Apple MacBook Pro (13-inch, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD Storage, Magic Keyboard) - Space Grey
feature_bullets: Eighth-generation quad-core Intel Core i5 processor
Brilliant Retina display with True Tone technology
Up to 10 hours of battery life
